summary: 17 CFR § 230.163 provides an exemption from section 5(c) of the Securities Act for certain communications by well-known seasoned issuers before filing a registration statement, provided the communication is a free writing prospectus and includes a specified legend. The issuer must also file the communication with the SEC promptly upon filing the registration statement, with exceptions for previously filed documents or those not requiring filing under Rule 433. The exemption does not apply to business combination transactions or communications by certain investment companies.
